compounddef.title: Tutorial: Default Galerkin with explicit time stepping

simplesect.para: This tutorial shows how to create and solve a defalt time-explicit Galerkin problem.

sect1.title: What is a default Galerkin problem?
sect1.para: pressio4py supports different variants of Galerkin. The "default" qualification is used to indicate a formulation that does not use hyper-reduction. In practice, a default Galerkin problem corresponds to solving the following problem:
